alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:30PM CDT until April 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HARRIS COUNTY... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carverdale, or over Jersey Village, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Jersey Village, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Branch North, Spring Valley, western Northside / Northline, Hedwig Village, Spring Branch Central, Westbranch, Langwood, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Acres Home, Greater Inwood, Carverdale, Willowbrook, Central Northwest, Spring Branch East and Memorial. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
